GetName.name: GetName
GetName.description: Returns a String value representing the name of the object.

SetName.name: SetName
SetName.description: Sets a String value representing the name of the object.

SetRefersTo.name: SetRefersTo
SetRefersTo.description: Sets the formula that the name is defined to refer to.

params.name: sRef
params.description: Must contain the sheet name, followed sign ! , followed by a range of cells. Example: "Sheet1!$A$1:$B$2".

GetRefersTo.name: GetRefersTo
GetRefersTo.description: Returns the formula that the name is defined to refer to.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a name.
	 * @constructor
	 * @property {string} Name - Sets a name to the active sheet.
	 * @property {string} RefersTo - Returns or sets the formula that the name is defined to refer to.
	 * @property {apiRange} RefersToRange - Returns the ApiRange object by reference.
	 */

properties.name: Name
properties.description: Sets a name to the active sheet.

properties.name: RefersTo
properties.description: Returns or sets the formula that the name is defined to refer to.
